title: Serena Reborn: The Final Battle
description: The wood sprite village is in the process of rebuilding after the horrific battle with the evil queen. Serena has returned home and for a moment she finds peace. However, a traitor is in their midst and after the suspicious death of Serena's mother, she leaves her home in search of answers. She soon finds that she too is very ill and may not complete her journey. Will the evil queen win? Will good prevail? Find out in the final book of the wood sprite tale.
author: Lachelle Redd
